mapper.insert: insert into qnaboard (user_id, subject, content, hit, register_time) values (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now())
insert into memo (user_id, comment, memo_time, article_no) values (#{user_id}, #{comment}, now(), #{article_no})
mapper.select: select article_no, user_id, subject, content, hit, register_time from qnaboard order by article_no desc
select b.article_no, b.user_id, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time, m.user_name from qnaboard b, members m where b.user_id = m.user_id and b.article_no = #{articleNo}
